Luzbel/Kali/attilla/Shivah/Thyphon/Alecto/Deepfear/Charon::

Kali/Luzbel::

They continued following Iguanus and shooting agaisnt him (Luzbel, 25 
shot; Kali, 20 shots and 5 seeking-missiles)

Attilla/Shivah::

Both continued following Slayer. Attilla shot 5 times and he 
destroyed the seeking missiles and shot 20 times more against Slayer. 
Shivah changed to robod mode and shot his mega-blast 25times agaisnt 
Slayer. while they was shooting they increased the speed.

Thyphon/Alecto::

They left the base large time ago. Alecto saw Iguanus and started 
shoot (25 times) Thyphon was swiming in the botton of the sea, 
waitting his chance.

Deepfear/Charon::

The bot appeared in surface (in land), they changed to Vehicle mode 
and started to shoot against iguanus. Deepfear shot 22 missiles, 
while Charon shot 25. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
>

to 
> head right toward the bots following him. He sets his jets on 
maximum 
> burn, zoomning over the Predacons' heads and firing two signature 
> seeking missiles when he was right above them, and then slowing 
down 
> slightly so that they could keep up. He was heading toward 
Ignatis's 
> position.
